subdisciplines.name: Morpheme-based Morphology
subdisciplines.description: The analysis of words through decomposing them into morphemes, the smallest unit of meaning.

subdisciplines.name: Word-based Morphology
subdisciplines.description: The study of words and how they are formed from smaller units of meaning.

subdisciplines.name: Paradigmatic Morphology
subdisciplines.description: The study of paradigms, which are sets of words that share the same grammatical properties.

subdisciplines.name: Syntagmatic Morphology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationship between morphemes in a sentence, and how they combine to create meaning.
